articles.author: Brooke Masters
articles.title: BlackRock assets under management hit all-time high of $10.6tn - Financial Times
articles.description: Vibrant markets boost world’s largest asset manager but inflows dragged down as big client pulls $20bn
articles.content:
BlackRock powered to a record high of $10.6tn in assets under management thanks to vibrant markets, but it narrowly missed expectations for revenue as institutional inflows lagged behind.
The worlds… [+1585 chars]
